title: Kylie Jenner Teases Topless Pics From Bed
text:
Kylie Jenner is letting loose with her new single status!

The "KUWTK" star is posing without any clothes from the most comfortable place on earth, her bed!

Related:

Kylie Jenner Cashes In On 'Rise & Shine' Fame With Pricey Merchandise

Kylie Jenner Has Seen The "Rise And Shine" Memes And She's Playing Along

Newly-Single Kylie Jenner Takes Stormi to First Pumpkin Patch Without Travis Scott

Single Life, It Does Kylie Jenner's Body Good!

Kylie Jenner Admits She Wants More Kids Post Travis Scott Split

Rise & Shine!

Kylie struts her stuff topless while coyly covering herself with the bedsheets in photos she dropped on social media Friday. The 22-year-old is showing just enough skin to make imaginations run wild.

"Bbygirl [sic]," she captioned the series of sexy shots.

Bedroom Beauty!

Kylie's tanned skin and long luscious locks skim her white down comforter while she poses solo in bed.

Looking seductively at the camera, the only thing she's sporting is a diamond ring on her middle finger and heavy makeup.

The newly-single star has been flaunting her curves more than usual after calling it quits with Travis Scott earlier this month.

Viral Queen!

Maybe she's just trying to get attention, or perhaps she's alluding to her viral "Rise and Shine" fame.

Kylie shocked fans when she showcased her singing chops while waking up her daughter, Stormi.

She's cashing in on her natural talent too.

Take All Our $$$

As The Blast reported, the youngest billionaire found another way to bring in the benjamins.

She's selling two different sweatshirts on her kyliejennershop.com with those three little words and her smiling face on them.

Of course, they'll set you back a pretty penny. The Kylie Cosmetics mogul has them priced for $65 a pop.

B is For Billionaire!

Fans weren't the only ones impressed with her vocals.

Singers like Miley Cyrus and Ariana Grande both stanned over the reality star's chops.

Miley shared a fake clip of Kylie on "The Voice" and pretended that all four judges, including herself, turned their chairs. Ariana belted out her own version of the star's wake up song for Stormi.

One person not a fan of Kylie's lyrics? Her one-year-old daughter.
